What is Online Medha Yoga Level 1?

The Problem

Research shows that happy teens turn into healthy adults. But happy teens are becoming a rarity. While tackling the transition from childhood to adulthood, they are dealing with a host of challenges: studies, entrance exams, peer pressure, and relationships. And so, teen stress is rising rapidly.

Our Solution

Happy and calm teens are able to stay resilient despite challenges. The Medha Yoga Level 1 focuses on just that: to make teens stress-free and happy yet focused go-getters. The program helps participants overcome negative emotions and deal with stress through special breathing techniques. With tips and groups discussions around topics like studies, peer pressure, and self-esteem, the program guides them on how to unleash their full potential. In addition, important life skills like teamwork and cooperation are honed through interactive processes and games.

What is Prajñā Yoga - Intuition Process

‘Intuition means having the right thought at the right moment.’

– Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

Our consciousness holds immense unexplored potential. The intuition process helps children tap the mind’s possibilities safely. It enables the mind to perceive beyond the five senses and access intuition or the sixth sense. Having a strong and well-developed intuition helps you take good decisions, communicate better, and builds confidence. Intuition aids discovery and innovation. It has shown to better academic performance and interpersonal relationships.

Since this is something inherent and not evident in our daily lives, the question of how to develop intuition becomes relevant and interesting.

Program Benefits:

  • Strengthen leadership skills
  • Enhance memory and concentration
  • Eliminate doubt and worry
  • Decrease stress and anxiety
  • Restful sleep and stronger immune system
  • Be happy, vibrant and joyful
  • Improve relationships

Program Details

Program Details

Open to all teenagers between 13+ up to 18 years

Time per day: 2 hours

Program duration: 3 days

Frequently Asked Questions

For which age-group is the program?

13 - 18 yrs

For how long is the program?

4-6 days, 3-4 hours daily

What will participants learn in the program?

Medha Yoga Level - 1 is based on ancient breathing techniques and a special breathing technique developed by Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar. Course content includes:

  • Sudarshan Kriya
  • Meditation and breathing techniques
  • Yoga that re-energizes the mind and body
  • Simple tenets for daily challenges
  • Study tips
  • Tips for increasing concentration and memory
  • Techniques for mental focus and concentration
  • Techniques for overcoming fear and anxiety
  • Interactive processes
  • Team games

What benefits can I expect from the program?

With regular practice of techniques taught in the program, teens have been able to:

  • Handle negative emotions with ease
  • Feel stress-free and light from within
  • Handle peer pressure
  • Learn to smile no matter what
  • Feel positive
  • Overcome stage fear

Note: The daily practice takes 20-25 minutes.
